name: YOUNG PEOPLE'S ALLIANCE
description: We are a student-led nonprofit empowering young people through advocacy and organizing.
sampleDescriptions: We are advocating for the introduction of legislation that would create data privacy protections for social media users, however a bill has not been introduced and is in a draft stage, with a name yet
